label: 在家
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Originally, the residential structures of hyakushō on kokugaryō and shōen; later the immediately adjacent land as well; both could be taxed as a unit. Sometimes, a peasant's family. (See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu)　[百姓、国衙領、荘園]
